# Class ToolCallData

Class for managing a ToolCallData, which wraps a ToolCall object.

##### Index

### Methods

destroy fromToolCallInterface

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Destroys the ToolCallData instance and frees associated resources. This method should be called when the object is no longer needed to prevent memory leaks.

#### Returns void

Overrides BaseData.destroy




### `Static`fromToolCallInterface

  * fromToolCallInterface(toolCallInterface: [ToolCallInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)): [ToolCallData]()

Creates a new ToolCallData instance from a ToolCallInterface.

#### Parameters

    * toolCallInterface: [ToolCallInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)

The tool call interface to wrap

#### Returns [ToolCallData]()
